product_metadata.plan_type: Unit-linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Savings Insurance Plan
product_metadata.risk_disclaimer: Investment risk in the investment portfolio is borne by the policyholder.
product_metadata.lock_in_rule: No surrender or withdrawal allowed during the first 5 policy years.

product_summary.objective: Fortune Gain II is a Single Premium ULIP designed to maximize wealth creation by offering very high premium allocation, loyalty additions at maturity, flexible fund options, liquidity through withdrawals, and installment payout through settlement option.
key_highlights: Single Premium savings ULIP with life cover
Up to 99.5% premium allocation for single premium ≥ ₹10 Lakhs
Loyalty Additions of 5.6% of Single Premium (for ≥₹10 Lakhs, PT 10–30)
Multiple fund investment choices including index funds
Partial and Systematic Partial Withdrawals allowed after 5 years
Settlement Option for maturity and death benefit payouts (up to 5 years)
Systematic Switching Option (SSO) available at inception

core_benefits.details: At maturity, the benefit payable is Single Premium Fund Value plus Top-up Fund Value as on maturity date, provided policy is in force.
Higher of (Prevailing Sum Assured or Single Premium Fund Value) plus higher of (Top-up Sum Assured or Top-up Fund Value).
core_benefits.guarantee: Guaranteed Death Benefit = 105% of Total Premiums paid till date of death.
core_benefits.note: Sum Assured reduced to extent of partial withdrawals from Single Premium Fund in last 2 years.

core_benefits.details: Up to 99.5% premium allocation for Single Premium ₹10 Lakhs and above.
Loyalty addition expressed as % of Single Premium is added to fund value at maturity based on premium slab and policy term.

sum_assured_rules.maximum: X × Single Premium based on entry age and policy term slab

partial_withdrawal.post_balance_requirement: Single Premium Fund Value must remain ≥ 1/5th of Single Premium

settlement_option.no_withdrawal_rule: No withdrawals allowed during settlement period

systematic_switching_option.name: SSO
systematic_switching_option.available: Only at inception for first 12 months
systematic_switching_option.monthly_transfer: 1/x of fund value transferred monthly into chosen funds
systematic_switching_option.auto_cancel: Cancelled if any switch is made later

riders.rider_name: Linked New Critical Illness Benefit Rider

compliance_guardrails.ulip_risk_warning: ULIPs are subject to capital market risks. NAV may go up or down.
compliance_guardrails.lock_in_period: 5 years mandatory lock-in as per IRDAI.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits subject to prevailing Income Tax laws.
compliance_guardrails.force_majeure_clause: NAV valuation may be deferred in extreme force majeure events (up to 30 days).
compliance_guardrails.fraud_warning: IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.

retrieval_chunks.text: Fortune Gain II is a single premium ULIP with up to 99.5% allocation and life cover throughout policy term.
If single premium is ₹10 Lakhs or above and policy term is 10–30 years, loyalty addition of 5.6% of premium is added at maturity.
Withdrawals allowed after lock-in, minimum ₹5,000, maximum 25% of fund value, with fund balance ≥1/5th of premium.
Maturity and death benefit can be received in installments for up to 5 years with investment risk borne by policyholder.
Multiple equity, debt and index funds available with unlimited free switching under investor selectable strategy.
